name: A legend of our tine
description: Once upon a time there was a homeless man named "Valera" who went looking for an adventure. asked for money and tried to survive. Lived as an ordinary homeless miimum of productivity and goals in life But one day on the garbage he finds a book that interested him. And he decided to read it and he liked it and he began to search and collect. All the books are on the trash and read them. And he slowly began to understand who he was and what he wanted. He began to become a person with dreams and goals. but at the same time he understood that he was an ordinary homeless man who was not washed and not shaved without education and in general any means. to fulfill their dreams. And he realized in order to get something you need to do something. And he began to act. And I started with a small collection of starter copies to achieve goals. but at the same time he did not cease to read the books of the good in the dumps of this good. and he had books on every taste and about financial literacy and Pushkin's poems. For this reason, he made his plan to become successful.
